description: Episode of Series "March of Time". A typical day in the life of a ten-year-old, presenting such common problems as the acceptance of a new brother and the refusal to eat. Emphasises the anxieties of parents over guiding their children in today's world, and explains ways in which to cope with behaviour problems.
